titleStmt.title: A perfect catalogue of all the knights of the most noble Order of the Garter. From the first institution of it, untill this present April, Auno [sic] 1661. Whereunto is prefixed a short discourse touching the institution of the Order, the patron, habit and solemnities of it, with many other particulars which concern the same. / Collected and continued by J.N.
titleStmt.author: J. N.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Anne Seile, over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
